body: Armor and weapons that are found at random have a 30% chance of being Small (01–30), a 60% chance of being Medium (31–90), and a 10% chance of being any other size (91–100).
name: Armor and Weapon Sizes
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Magic Items/Using Items/Size and Magic Items/Armor and Weapon Sizes
